posts.post_title: Want to downgrade this SGC 50 T206 Green Cobb
posts.post_content:
My last BST listing for the night (promise)...

I recently traded for this card.  Looking to downgrade to an SGC 40 and cash back in return.  LMK if you have anything to offer:
